description._content: Bain News Service,, publisher. E.P. Costigan 1915 Feb. 3 (date created or published later by Bain) 1 negative : glass ; 5 x 7 in. or smaller. Notes: Title and date from data provided by the Bain News Service on the negative. Photograph shows Edward Prentiss Costigan (1874-1939) who was a founder of the Progressive Party in Colorado and Colorado Senator from 1931 to 1937. Costigan testified at the 1915 hearings of the federal Commission on Industrial Relations in New York City. (Source: Flickr Commons project, 2012 and New York Times, Jan. 20, 1915) Forms part of: George Grantham Bain Collection (Library of Congress). Format: Glass negatives. Rights Info: No known restrictions on publication. Repository: Library of Congress, Prints and Photographs Division, Washington, D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print General information about the Bain Collection is available at hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.ggbain Higher resolution image is available (Persistent URL): hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/ggbain.18327 Call Number: LC-B2- 3369-10
